title: Looking for a duo to climb out of bronze
body: hey guys, i am looking for a duo partner to help me climb out of bronze, im well capable of playing in higher elos but i need improvements in many areas to achieve that, anyone willing to help add me and we can hit some ranked games.

replies.body: Hey man I'm currently bronze 4 and trying to climb back into silver. I main adc and supp but I can mid pretty well also. Add Axivia if you're still looking :)

I have this friend whom is whilling to climb out of bronze
His IGN: Killingrox
Skype Name: killingrox

He can play almost every role
Very dedicated, very easy to know, easy in general, loves to meet new friends.
{{champion:92}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:245}}
Hey mate im already in silver but am willing to help you. I play any role and own all champs and can play most of them, just add me if you want some help :)
